      • findUserIndex

        private int findUserIndex(java.lang.String userId)
        Takes in a user id and returns the index of that user in door's user list with the matching id. If no user is found return -1
        Parameters:
        userId - id of the user tp search for
        Returns:
        int representing index of user, or -1 if none found

      • checkUserAccess

        public boolean checkUserAccess(java.lang.String userID)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Check to see if a specified user has access, if so grant it otherwise deny access
        Parameters:
        userID - id of the user to get information about
        Returns:
        boolean representing whether or not the user hass access
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if id is more/less than 5 characters, or contains anything besides numbers
